description:
Note :

Layout must be set before adding component into the Frame while using GridBagLayout, Otherwise it returns following exception
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: cannot add to layout: constraint must be a string (or null)

Member Description
gridx Represent Row
gridy Represent Column
ipadx Internal left-right Padding
ipady Internal top-bottom Padding
GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL Make component wide enough to fill Horizontal display Area
GridBagConstraints.VERTICAL Make component tall enough to fill Vertical display Area
